summary:
This is a replacer for idle animations.
A variety of animations such as thinking with a hand on chin, feeling sleepy, feeling bored, brushing hair with fingers, will be played.
descriptionHtml:

This is a replacer for idle animations.
A variety of animations such as thinking with a hand on chin, feeling sleepy, feeling bored, brushing hair with fingers, will be played.
